name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knorket Share - Record, Annotate and Share

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knorket screen recorder for Chrome. Record, Annotate and Share.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Loom, Vimeo et. al are amazing tools to capture and share if you want to use their proprietary tech and platform for your video content. Knorket "Share" is an immersive feedback capture extension alternative that comes packed with range of features:

1. Make feedback recordings of desktop, application, any tab along with  camera
2. Annotate by adding text / drawing while doing the recording
3. Video and audio controls, custom countdowns etc.
4. Edit or remove sections of your recording
5.  Export as mp4, gif, and webm

With the extension, you will always have ability to use it for capturing and saving immersive videos and not locked-in to any vendor (us included).

Some use cases :
a. Use for feedback capture and sharing (developer-developer, customer-company etc)
b. Create customer support videos and screen captures 
c. Use for video marketing by embedding videos in your email tools
d. Use videos to create custom demos, make intro to prospects and train reps.

Thanks from Team Knorket!
